mapper.select: select o.moId,o.poId,e.empName as proposerName,o.applydate,o.auditorName,o.`Status`,o.outStock,o.Signfor from materialOrder o join main_employee e on e.empId=o.proposerId and o.moVisibles=1
select r.rawMaterialId,r.rawMaterialName,o.weight from materialOrderDetails o join main_rawMaterial r on o.rawMaterialId=r.rawMaterialId where o.moId=#{moId}
mapper.update: update materialOrder set moVisibles =0 where moId=#{moId}
update materialOrder set `Status`='已审核',Auditingdate=#{auditingdate}, auditorName=#{auditorName} where moId=#{moId}
update materialOrder set Signfor='已签收' where moId=#{moId}
update productionOrder set poMaterialState ='已签收' where poId=#{poId}
